entry.title: Tired Friday Afternoon
entry.content: After working hard for two days dealing with game avatar real time building system, finally I feel lack of sleep and want to take a rest this whole afternoon. What hurts most is I can’t test till the 3D artist finished export what I want. Have to say that being worked on Unity3D for several months, this game editor really crashed my mind of game development stuffs. Sometimes it’s awesome, sometimes it’s bull-shit.
